ArchlightTest.description: Checks whether linked interfaces have compatible directions.
ArchlightTest.name: xADL 3/Structures/Interface Directions Compatible
ArchlightTest.Prolog: error(Id,'Connected interfaces have incompatible directions') :- type(L, link), attribute(L, id, Id), child(L, point1, P1), child(L, point2, P2), attribute(P1, direction, P1d), attribute(P2, direction, P2d), \+ compatible_directions(P1d, P2d). error(Id, 'Connected interfaces have incompatible directions') :- type(L, interfaceMapping), attribute(L, id, Id), child(L, innerInterfaceLink, P1), child(L, outerInterfaceLink, P2), attribute(P1, direction, P1d), attribute(P2, direction, P2d), P1d \= P2d.
